mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_EVENT( USERID, EVENTDATE, EVENTMAIN, EVENTTITLE ) VALUES ( #{userid}, #{pdate}, #{eventmain}, #{eventtitle} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_EVENT WHERE USERID=#{userid} AND TO_CHAR(EVENTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') =TO_CHAR(#{pdate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
mapper.update: UPDATE T_EVENT SET EVENTMAIN=#{eventmain}, EVENTTITLE=#{eventtitle} WHERE USERID=#{userid} AND TO_CHAR(EVENTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')=TO_CHAR(#{pdate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
mapper.select: SELECT USERID, EVENTDATE, EVENTMAIN, EVENTTITLE FROM T_EVENT WHERE USERID=#{userid}
